data.question: What is the significance of the electrical conductivity measurements for the synthesized macrocycles?

data.question: What method was used to correct for absorption effects in the X-ray diffraction data analysis of MC4•NaClO4?
data.answer: The multi-scan method (TWINABS) was used to correct for absorption effects in the X-ray diffraction data analysis of MC4•NaClO4.

data.question: What challenges were encountered during the X-ray diffraction data collection of MC4•NaClO4?
data.answer: During the X-ray diffraction data collection of MC4•NaClO4, challenges included dealing with a non-merohedral twin crystal and indexing multiple domains.
